item.title: Apple's M4-powered MacBook Air reportedly set to soar in early 2025: What to expect | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Apple’s M4-powered MacBook Air reportedly set to soar in early 2025: What to expect

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: MacRumors

Apple is set to kick off 2025 with the announcement of refreshed 13-inch and 15-inch MacBook Air models, featuring the M4 chip with significant performance and battery life improvements.

  • The M4 chip includes a 10-core CPU and GPU, showing a 25% boost in performance over the M3 chip.
  • Base models will likely start with 16GB of RAM, increasing from 8GB.
  • Potential upgrade includes a 12MP camera with Centre Stage technology for improved video calls.
  • Enhanced connectivity with three Thunderbolt 4 ports and support for two external displays.
  • Announcement expected between January and March, before other spring releases.
"The M4's improved power efficiency is anticipated to extend battery life, a hallmark feature of the MacBook Air range."

The upcoming MacBook Air models promise to enhance user experience with performance upgrades and improved connectivity while maintaining the design integrity of previous versions.

item.title: Ulips will grow as Indians have faith in stock mkts: PolicyBazaar.com CEO - Business Standard
item.description:
ULIPs Will Grow as Indians Trust Stock Markets: Insights from PolicyBazaar.com CEO

Date: Jan 02 2025 | Source: PolicyBazaar.com

Sarbvir Singh, the CEO of PolicyBazaar.com, discusses key insurance trends for 2024 and expectations for the upcoming year.

  • Health insurance became increasingly relevant in 2024, paralleling concerns over rising costs.
  • Insurance policies saw an increase in the sum insured but also faced price hikes.
  • The conversation focuses on affordability and accessibility in the health insurance market.
“The relevance of health insurance on the consumer side became quite well-established.”

As the stock market gains trust among Indians, the growth and evolution of Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIPs) are anticipated.

item.title: Five new iPhones are launching this year, here’s what’s coming - 9to5Mac
item.description:
Five new iPhones are launching this year, here’s what’s coming

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: 9to5Mac

Apple is set to launch five new iPhone models this year, bringing significant upgrades and new designs to the table. Here’s an overview of what to expect from each of the upcoming models.

Key Points:

  • iPhone SE 4: Major upgrades, including an A18 chip, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP camera.
  • iPhone 17 Air: Thinner design, A19 chip, prioritizing form over function.
  • iPhone 17 Pro: Upgraded internals including a redesigned frame and camera enhancements.
  • iPhone 17 Pro Max: Features improved battery life and potential camera advantages over the Pro.
  • iPhone 17: Expected to have a 24MP front camera and maintain the same 6.1-inch display as the previous model.

Conclusion:

The new iPhones set to launch in 2025 promise to cater to various consumer needs, from budget-friendly options to premium devices. This lineup looks to strengthen Apple's position in the smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy A16 launches in the US with 6 major Android updates for $199 - 9to5Google
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy A16 launches in the US with 6 major Android updates for $199

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 Source: 9to5Google

Samsung has introduced the Galaxy A16, a budget-friendly smartphone in the US, offering incredible value with extensive software support and solid hardware features.

  • The Galaxy A16 features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate.
  • It is powered by Exynos 1330 with a 5,000 mAh battery supporting 25W fast charging.
  • The phone has a 50MP rear camera, a 5MP ultra-wide lens, and a 2MP macro camera, along with a 13MP selfie camera.
  • It is IP54 rated for water resistance, a rarity in its price category.
  • Samsung promises 6 years of Android updates and security patches starting with Android 14.
  • The device will be available in black and blue color options.
“Receive 6 generations of One UI and Android OS upgrades, as well as 6 years of security updates.”

The Galaxy A16 sets a high standard for budget smartphones by combining affordability with long-term software support.

item.title: Vice City awaits: Everything we know about GTA 6 so far - The Indian Express
item.description:
Vice City awaits: Everything we know about GTA 6 so far

Publication Date: 2025
Source: Insider Gaming

Now that 2025 is here, Grand Theft Auto fans have all the reasons in the world to rejoice. Rockstar Games confirmed that GTA 6 will be taking players back to Vice City and even uploaded a teaser trailer back in 2023, which gave us insight on what to expect from the upcoming game.

Key Points:

  • Launch Date: Expected in fall 2025 according to Take-Two Interactive.
  • Platform Availability: Initially limited to Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5 Pro, with the PC version potentially arriving in 2027.
  • Map and Gameplay: Set in a modern-day Vice City, with new protagonists and plans for additional cities post-launch.
  • Trailer Updates: Rumors suggest that a second trailer for GTA 6 may be released soon.
“Probably not in a position to determine whether they will hit 2025 until May-ish.” - Rockstar North technical director Obbe Vermeij

With excitement building among fans, Rockstar Games appears poised to make a significant impact with the release of GTA 6, combining nostalgia with modern gaming advancements.

item.title: CES 2025 In January: New AI Laptops, Smart Glasses And 8K TVs To Expect - News18
item.description:
CES 2025 Unveils New AI Laptops, Smart Glasses, and 8K TVs

Publication Date: January 02, 2025, Source: News18

The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025 is set to take place in Las Vegas starting January 7. The event will showcase advancements in technology, particularly focusing on AI integration in laptops and smart home devices.

Key Points:

  • The event features major industry players like Google, OpenAI, and Apple.
  • New AI-centric products, including possible innovations in hardware.
  • Exciting developments in laptops, including potential rollable screen technology.
  • Expansion into the smart home market with AI-integrated devices.
  • Continued emphasis on 8K TVs amid questions about available content.
"2025 promises a lot more in the waiting regarding AI technology and its applications."

CES 2025 is poised to provide significant insights into technological advancements for the year, focusing heavily on AI enhancements across various product types.

item.title: Motorola launching budget Moto G05 in India, to offer features you get with Rs 25,000 phones - India Today
item.description:
Motorola Launching Budget Moto G05 in India with Premium Features

Published On: Jan 2, 2025 By: Ankita Garg

Motorola is set to launch its latest budget smartphone, the Moto G05, in India on January 7, offering features typically found in phones priced under Rs 25,000.

  • The Moto G05 is expected to be priced around Rs 10,000.
  • Features include a 90Hz display with 1,000 nits brightness, Dolby Atmos sound, and a vegan leather finish.
  • It will have water touch technology, allowing use of the screen with wet hands, and an IP52 water resistance rating.
  • Powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme chipset, it includes 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, and a 5,200mAh battery.
  • Camera setup comprises a 50MP dual rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
“The Moto G05 aims to shake up the budget smartphone market and offer serious competition.”

Stay tuned for the official pricing and updates.

item.title: Tech wrap Jan 2: LG Gram laptops, Samsung Good Lock, Realme 14 Pro series - Business Standard
item.description:
Tech wrap Jan 2: LG Gram laptops, Samsung Good Lock, Realme 14 Pro series

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Unknown

LG, the South Korean electronics giant, is set to debut its new line of Gram laptops at the Consumer Electronics Show 2025 in Las Vegas, US, starting January 7. These laptops will feature on-device artificial intelligence capabilities.

  • LG's new Gram laptops will be unveiled at CES 2025.
  • Samsung's Good Lock app to launch globally alongside One UI 7.
  • Realme's 14 Pro series smartphones to feature a triple-reflection periscope camera.
  • POCO to launch X7 series smartphones in India on January 9.
  • Vivo reduces T3x 5G smartphone prices to ₹12,499.
A significant advancement in artificial intelligence, AI agents represent the next step beyond generative AI.

In conclusion, the tech updates from January 2 highlight significant advancements in smartphones and AI technologies, with upcoming launches from major brands.

item.title: Moto G05 Set to Launch in India on January 7; Specifications Revealed - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Moto G05 to Launch in India on January 7; Specifications Revealed

Publication Date: January 7, 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

The Moto G05 is set to launch in India with impressive specifications, including a large display and a powerful battery, and will be available on Flipkart.

  • The Moto G05 features a 6.67-inch HD+ display and is powered by a Mediatek Helio G81 Extreme chipset.
  • It comes with a 5,200mAh battery that supports 18W fast charging.
  • The smartphone runs on Android 15 and promises two years of security updates.
  • Available in Green and Red colors with a vegan leather back panel.
  • The device has a 50MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • It features Dolby Atmos support and has an IP52-rated build.
"The battery unit is claimed to deliver up to two days of battery life and up to 39 hours of talktime on a single charge."

The Moto G05 launch is highly anticipated due to its competitive pricing and specifications, aiming to attract users looking for quality smartphones under Rs. 10,000.

item.title: First NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 GPU Custom Model Leaks Out: 16 GB GDDR7 Memory Confirmed, 2.2 Slot Design - Wccftech
item.description:
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 GPU Custom Model Leak Reveals Key Specs

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Chiphell Forums

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 GPU has leaked, showcasing an exciting glimpse into NVIDIA’s upcoming next-gen gaming hardware.

  • The custom model from MSI features a 2.2-slot design with enhanced cooling.
  • It includes 16 GB of GDDR7 memory and a 256-bit bus interface.
  • The card supports cutting-edge technologies such as NVIDIA DLSS and ray tracing.
  • Specs mentioned include a dedicated power of 400W.
  • Launch is expected in Q1 2025.
“The RTX 5080 will feature the fastest GDDR7 memory on the market, offering up to 32 Gbps speeds.”

This leak marks an important development for gamers anticipating the next generation of graphic performance.

item.title: Upcoming smartphone launches in January 2025: OnePlus 13, Poco X7 Pro and more - Mint
item.description:
Upcoming smartphone launches in January 2025: OnePlus 13, Poco X7 series and more

Published on: 2 Jan, 2025 Source: Mint

As we move into the new year, tech enthusiasts and smartphone lovers await the most anticipated mobile device launches this January 2025, featuring major offerings from OnePlus, Realme, Oppo, Poco, and Redmi.

  • Major launches include the OnePlus 13 series, Oppo Reno 13 series, and Poco X7 series.
  • The OnePlus 13 is expected to feature cutting-edge technology with a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a 6,000mAh battery.
  • Realme will unveil its 14 Pro series with advanced camera technologies.
  • Poco is expected to release the Poco X7 and X7 Pro with competitive specifications.
  • Redmi is launching the Redmi 14C, projected to be budget-friendly with solid performance.
“January 2025 promises to bring a slew of exciting new devices from some of the biggest players in the market.”

This January is shaping up to be a significant month for smartphone launches, as various brands introduce devices with features designed to capture the attention of consumers worldwide.

item.title: Samsung bets big on OLED and gaming with its 2025 monitor lineup - The Verge
item.description:
Samsung Unveils New OLED Monitors for Gaming and Productivity at CES 2025

Date: January 2025 Source: The Verge

Image: Samsung

Samsung has introduced a new lineup of monitors, leading with the Odyssey OLED G81SF featuring advanced gaming capabilities and the Smart Monitor M9 transitioning to OLED for enhanced productivity.

  • The Odyssey OLED G81SF is a 27-inch 4K monitor with a 240Hz refresh rate and features burn-in protection.
  • The Odyssey OLED G60SF offers QHD resolution and a 500Hz refresh rate for smooth gameplay.
  • The new Odyssey 3D monitor allows 3D viewing without glasses, employing eye tracking technology.
  • The Smart Monitor M9 includes AI Picture Optimizer and AI Upscaling Pro for improved visual quality.
  • The ViewFinity S8 is a new 37-inch model focused on productivity, boasting a non-OLED display with KVM switch capabilities.
This marks Samsung's commitment to enhancing user experience through OLED technology in both gaming and productivity monitors.

More details regarding pricing and release dates are expected to be announced during CES 2025.

item.title: OnePlus 13 series, Samsung Galaxy S25 series, Realme 14 Pro series and other upcoming smartphone launches - The Times of India
item.description:
OnePlus 13 series, Samsung Galaxy S25 series, Realme 14 Pro series and other upcoming smartphone launches in January 2025

Published on: January 2025, Source: Times of India

As January 2025 approaches, several smartphone manufacturers are set to launch their latest devices, including the OnePlus 13 series, Samsung Galaxy S25 series, and Realme 14 Pro series. These new models are anticipated to feature cutting-edge technology and enhanced functionalities.

  • OnePlus 13 series will focus on advanced camera capabilities and faster charging solutions.
  • Samsung’s Galaxy S25 series aims to enhance user experience with improved battery life and display technology.
  • Realme 14 Pro series is expected to offer competitive pricing with innovative features appealing to budget-conscious consumers.
“The smartphone market continues to evolve, with manufacturers racing to integrate the latest technology,” industry experts predict.

Consumers can expect exciting advancements as these brands unveil their new models, aiming to capture consumer interest in the competitive smartphone landscape.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series leak: Snapdragon 8 Elite chip confirmed ahead of January launch - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 series leak: Snapdragon 8 Elite chip confirmed ahead of January launch

Date & Source: January 2025 - India TV News

Samsung is set to launch its Galaxy S25 series this month, with leaks confirming the use of Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.

Key Points:

  • Snapdragon 8 Elite power confirmed: The international model SM-S931B has appeared on Geekbench, showing Android 15 OS and 12GB RAM.
  • Performance: Scores of 2,986 (single-core) and 9,355 (multi-core) were recorded.
  • Significant upgrades: Expected improvements in display, camera, battery, and design.
  • Galaxy S25 Slim: A possible later entry variant is in the works.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

"The tested unit could be a prototype. The final version is expected to deliver enhanced performance."

Conclusion:

Samsung's Galaxy S25 series is anticipated to redefine flagship smartphones through cutting-edge technology and design.

item.title: Vivo T3x 5G Price in India Slashed by Rs. 1,000: Here's How Much It Costs Now - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Vivo T3x 5G Price in India Slashed by Rs. 1,000

Date: October 2023

Source: Gadgets 360

The Vivo T3x 5G, released last year, has seen a price drop of Rs. 1,000 in India, making it more affordable for customers.

  • New price for 4GB + 128GB variant is Rs. 12,499.
  • 6GB + 128GB variant priced at Rs. 13,999.
  • 8GB + 128GB variant priced at Rs. 15,499.
  • Customers can benefit from additional bank discounts on Flipkart.
  • No-cost EMI options start at Rs. 4,167 per month.
"The Vivo T3x 5G has a 6,000mAh battery with support for 44W fast charging."

With this price adjustment, the Vivo T3x 5G aims to attract more smartphone users while offering impressive specifications.

item.title: Samsung Odyssey OLED G8, Four Other Monitors Announced Ahead of CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Announces New Lineup of Monitors Ahead of CES 2025

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung is set to reveal its new range of monitors, including the Odyssey OLED G8 and 3D models, at CES 2025, commencing on January 7 in Las Vegas. The lineup features cutting-edge technology, highlighting AI capabilities and significant enhancements in display quality.

  • Monitors include the 2025 Smart Monitor M9, Odyssey OLED G8, and others.
  • The Smart Monitor M9 features a 32-inch OLED display with 4K resolution and 165Hz refresh rate.
  • AI Picture Optimiser adjusts picture quality based on content.
  • The Odyssey OLED G8 offers a 27-inch 4K display and 240Hz refresh rate.
  • Odyssey G8 3D can display 3D content without glasses.
  • The Viewfinity S8 boasts a 37-inch 4K screen with USB Type-C connectivity.
  • Pricing and availability will be confirmed at CES 2025.
“Samsung’s monitors leverage AI-based deep learning to enhance user experience.”

Overall, Samsung's new monitor unveiling promises to bring innovative features and significant improvements to user experience, indicating a strong focus on quality and advanced technology.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 With MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC, 6,550mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 With Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC, 6,550mAh Battery Launched

Publication Date: Thursday | Source: Gadgets 360

The Redmi Turbo 4 has been launched in China as the first smartphone with the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset, featuring a large 6,550mAh battery with fast charging support.

  • Equipped with a 50MP dual rear camera system.
  • 1.5K OLED display with a refresh rate of 120Hz.
  • Multiple RAM and storage options available, up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage.
  • IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
  • Available in three colors: Lucky Cloud White, Shadow Black, and Shallow Sea Blue.
“The Redmi Turbo 4 is said to be the first smartphone to carry the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC.”

With its robust features, the Redmi Turbo 4 aims to set new benchmarks for smartphones in terms of performance and battery life.

item.title: Vivo announces price cut for T3x 5G smartphone: Check new prices, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Vivo announces price cut for T3x 5G smartphone: Check new prices, specs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Business Standard

The Vivo T3x 5G smartphone has received a price reduction across all variants, making it more accessible to consumers. The smartphone, launched in April last year, offers enhanced specifications for its new lower prices.

New Prices:

  • 4GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 12,499 (was Rs 13,499)
  • 6GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 13,999 (was Rs 14,999)
  • 8GB RAM + 128GB storage: Rs 15,499 (was Rs 16,499)

Features:

  • Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset
  • 6.72-inch FHD+ resolution display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • 6000mAh battery with 44W fast charging
  • Dual rear camera: 50MP + 2MP, 8MP front camera
“Vivo highlights the inclusion of its RAM 3.0 technology, enabling up to 8GB of virtual RAM for enhanced multitasking.”

This price cut aims to enhance the smartphone's competitiveness in the growing market.
